entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
